name: MTLPipelineOption
desc: Options that determine how Metal prepares the pipeline.

items.name: static var argumentInfo: MTLPipelineOption
items.desc: An option that requests argument information for buffers, textures, and threadgroup memory.

items.name: static var bufferTypeInfo: MTLPipelineOption
items.desc: An option that requests detailed buffer type information for buffer arguments.

items.name: static var failOnBinaryArchiveMiss: MTLPipelineOption
items.desc: An option that specifies that Metal should create the pipeline state object only if the compiled shader is present inside the binary archive.
